title: Gravitation - Potential energy of three spheres

content.question: Which of the following expressions represents the final gravitational potential energy of the three-sphere system?

choices.label: <math alttext="the fraction negative G times m squared, over r" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mrow><mo>−</mo><mi>G</mi><msup><mi>m</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mi>r</mi></mfrac></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the fraction negative 2 G m squared, over r" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>G</mi><msup><mi>m</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mi>r</mi></mfrac></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the fraction negative 4 G m squared, over r" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn><mi>G</mi><msup><mi>m</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mi>r</mi></mfrac></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the fraction negative 5 G m squared, over r" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>5</mn><mi>G</mi><msup><mi>m</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mi>r</mi></mfrac></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="the fraction negative 5 G m squared, over r" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>5</mn><mi>G</mi><msup><mi>m</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mi>r</mi></mfrac></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
